meaningMnemonic: A <radical>tsunami</radical> lifts all the <radical>trash</radical> out of the <radical>river</radical> and it <kanji>stream</kanji>s out onto the shores.
readingMnemonic: Next to the trash <kanji>stream</kanji> you suddenly see <reading>Ryu</reading> (りゅう) from Street Fighter and he looks pissed. He's furious that so many people throw their trash in the river and it causes streams like this.
